name: Node Building Sandbox
description:
Remember 'World of Goo'?

It's a pretty great 2D physics puzzle game! I play it on mobile all the time.

But I got to thinking... why is there no level editor? Why is there no sandbox? I want to play around with 2D physics damn it!

So I hacked together a prototype just for that! A completely sandboxed 'World of Goo' clone. Made with love in about 25 minutes.

What is the future of the project?

I'm not sure, but I think I will most likely add some new features when I will have time.
Here, I made a small Trello board to keep track of my ideas!
